Lower the heat, cover, and simmer until the water is absorbed, approximately 20 minutes. Set aside.
Heat oil in a wok over medium heat. Sautï¿½ onions and garlic in the hot oil until they become tender.
Combine the cooked rice, salt, and sugar; continue cooking and stirring occasionally until everything is well mixed, about 5 minutes.
